prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GlobalCuisines
Title: The Art of Balinese Cooking: An Exploration into Traditional Indonesian Dishes
Description: Venture into the delectable world of Indonesian cuisine with a deep dive into the traditional cooking methods and ingredients of Bali. This article uncovers the island's rich culinary history and provides authentic recipes for you to recreate at home.
Sure, tell me more!

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GreenThumbGurus
Title: Urban Gardening Revolution: How to Grow Your Own Food in Small Spaces
Description: Learn how to maximize your small space for food production with our in-depth guide to urban gardening. From choosing the right plants to innovative vertical gardening techniques, this article offers practical tips to turn your city balcony or tiny backyard into a sustainable food source.
I have a small space and food is getting very expensive so this is perfect for me.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumUniverse
Title: The Intricacies of Quantum Computing: A Deep Dive into Quantum Physics and Data Processing
Description: Explore the groundbreaking field of quantum computing with this comprehensive guide. Understand the principles of quantum physics that underpin this technology, and how it is set to revolutionize data processing. This article is crucial for those seeking to stay ahead of the curve in the ever-evolving world of technology.
I'm not sure if this is for me.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: StarGazersDelight

Dive into the deep recesses of space, exploring nebulae, distant galaxies, and cosmic phenomena that will leave you in awe. Perfect for astronomy enthusiasts or anyone with a curiosity about the universe.
Absolutely not

This article explores the delicate balance between historical accuracy and creative license, providing an intriguing glimpse into life in the Tudor court. A must-read for fans of history, literature, and everything in between.
Not sure this is for me.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: EcoAdventures

Description: Uncover the secrets to responsible tourism in this comprehensive guide to sustainable travel. Learn how to explore the world while minimizing your environmental impact, supporting local economies, and promoting cultural exchange. Ideal for the conscious traveler seeking adventure with a purpose.
Tell me about something else!

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: NeurologyNow
Title: Mind Over Matter: The Power of Neuroplasticity

This article outlines the latest research on how our brains can adapt, learn, and heal, challenging long-held beliefs about the brain's rigidity. Relevant for individuals interested in neuroscience, personal growth, health & wellness, or the general mysteries of the human mind.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CryptoCurrencyWeekly

Description: Set sail on a journey across the cryptocurrency landscape, examining the workings of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other digital currencies. This article helps demystify blockchain technology, discusses the potential impacts of decentralized finance, and offers a glimpse into the future of money. Ideal for beginners and seasoned investors alike who are keen to understand the crypto ecosystem and its implications for the global economy.
I am only interested in real money

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FashionForward
Title: The Evolution of Haute Couture: From Marie Antoinette to Modern Runways
Description: Traverse the illustrious timeline of haute couture in this captivating article. From its origins in the royal court of Marie Antoinette to the innovative designs gracing today's runways, this piece offers a comprehensive look at the transformative history of high fashion. Ideal for fashion enthusiasts, history buffs, and anyone seeking to understand the cultural significance of clothing in society.
Yes, fashion is right up my alley!

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtificialIntelligenceDaily

Description: This article delves into the transformative role of artificial intelligence in the legal sector. From predictive analytics in case outcomes to increasing efficiency in legal research and document review, this piece provides a comprehensive understanding of how AI is reshaping the practice of law. Perfect for legal professionals, tech enthusiasts, or anyone curious about the future of AI in unconventional domains.
Not my thing!

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SportsAnalyze
Title: Crossing Boundaries: The Influence of Chess on Football Strategy
Description: This article explores the unlikely connection between chess strategy and football tactics, showing how principles from the 64 squares can be applied on the football pitch. Ideal for sports enthusiasts, chess lovers, or anyone interested in the cross-pollination of strategic thought in different disciplines.
Something more interesting would be much better please

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: BioGenNews
Title: Engineering Immortality: The Role of Genetic Modification in Extending Human Lifespan
Description: Delve into the exciting and controversial realm of genetic engineering and its potential to drastically extend human lifespan. This article discusses the latest advancements in genetic modification, ethical implications, societal impacts, and the scientific possibilities of achieving biological immortality. Ideal for those intrigued by biology, ethics, future tech, health & wellness, and philosophical aspects of life and death.
This isn't really helpful

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: MultiverseMusings
Title: Sci-Fi Meets Reality: The Possibility of Parallel Universes in Quantum Physics
Description: Take a thrilling journey into the realm of quantum physics with this article that explores the theoretical existence of parallel universes. Delve into the science behind the multiverse theory, the philosophical implications of parallel worlds, and how this concept has been represented in science fiction. This article is a treasure trove for fans of quantum physics, philosophy, and sci-fi alike, seeking to understand the universe beyond our own.
I like this topic

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CrossDisciplinaryConnections
Title: The Fusion of Art and Mathematics: Exploring the Visual Beauty of Numbers and Geometry
Description: This article bridges the gap between the world of art and the realm of mathematics. Discover how mathematical concepts like numbers, geometry, and fractals have influenced artistic expression, and how art, in turn, has helped visualize complex mathematical theories. This piece is designed for those interested in the unexpected intersections between different fields, be it art, mathematics, education, or the fascinating fusion of seemingly disparate disciplines.
Maybe not

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Gamer's Paradise
Title: Virtual Reality in Gaming: Immersive Worlds and the Future of Play
Description: Embark on a journey into the cutting-edge world of virtual reality gaming. This article examines the technology behind the most immersive gaming experiences, explores the potential for VR to revolutionize the way we play, and speculates on future developments in the industry. Ideal for gamers, tech enthusiasts, or anyone interested in the intersection of entertainment and technology.

feedback.feedback_other: I don't understand why their responses weren't based on my prompts or feedback. Seems useless.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
